dimensions: Warp x Weft: 19 x 27.5 cm (7 1/2 x 10 13/16 in.)
title: Sample
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: plain weave
description: Handwoven sample with a subtle horizontal stripe of black and white mixed yarns.  The warp is of off-white silk; the weft alternates two sheds of off-white plied silk yarns with three sheds of yarn which is a  combination of black and white silk threads, untwisted.  Narrow band top and bottom of plain weave with off-white cotton weft.
name: Sample
